hero.quote1: We believe that democracy creates better organizations and territories, and that technology should be at the service of people and their institutions.

features.title: Features
features.feat_3: Verifiable Voter By Using Face Recognition

steps.title: Steps
steps.step_1: Register yourself by filling the required information
steps.step_2: Get Your Hash code (Keep it Secret)

about.title: About
about.meet_the_team_p1: We are five Computer Engineering students at El Shorouk academy
about.p1: An online voting system that will replace the  old paper system. Over the time we have utilized the required technology in every sector to improve efficiency and save the extra resources. But the voting system is still very  expensive and requires a bigger workforce. The system is slower and still not completely tamper proof. We bring the system that is safe, reliable and solve the modern issues like higher reachability of the booth, crowd free voting,  inexpensive, faster results and others.

finish.title: Finish
finish.congratulations: Congratulations, you have finished your registration and you are able to use your hash code now to vote, your hash code is as the following

important_notes.title: Important Notes
important_notes.note_1: Your Hash code is very important Keep it secret
important_notes.note_2: Your Hash code is valid only one time

metamask.do_you_have: Do you have MetaMask on your device?
metamask.click_to_download: No I Haven't, Click here to download
